sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import '../css/JobCard.css'; // Import your CSS file import Location from '../images/Location.png' import Company from '../images/Company.png' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const JobCard = ({ job }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleViewJob = () => { // Navigate to the job description page navigate(`/job/${job.id}`); // Use the appropriate URL based on your routes }; return ( Full Stack Java Developer NSEIT Mumbai â‚¹3.5 - 10 LPA 4 - 6yrs Posted on 24 JUL 2023 ); }; export default JobCard;
